players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob, I think you might be the mafioso because of your silence last night."
Bob: " I am not the mafioso, because if I was, Charlie would have died in his bed and the detective wouldn't be able to investigate."
Diana: "Be careful, Bob. Your alibi might not hold up under scrutiny."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
